archimate:Requirement.name: R5 Define standards for the baseline and additional on-top modules to cover
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
U14 As sales/customer team I want to know that the baseline is covering the standards my customers are asking for to give my customer confidence and make them happy U23 As sales/customer team I want to ensure that the baseline is business relevant so that it provides value to our business
There will be a workshop with customer team & sales representatives to determine their needs.
